title: Osasumwen Emmanuel Igbinedion
summary: I am a full-stack Software Developer with a decade of experience developing commercial software applications. For 8 years I developed satellite-based beyond line of sight blue force tracking systems that run on desktops, mobile phones and the web. I have earned steady recognition for my outstanding contributions throughout my career. Notable clients include defence and military organizations. I have a  Bachelor’s degree in Computer Systems Engineering from Carleton University and I am PMP certified. I am dedicated to continued learning and spend my free time experimenting with new technologies and contributing to open-source software. My inbox osasigbinedion@gmail.com is always open. Whether for a potential project or just to say hi, I'll try my best to answer your email!

roles.title: Lead Software Engineer
roles.description: Lead Engineer For the Contextere Blue Collar AI Platform
roles.technologies: C#, VS 2019, NET Core 2.2+, Python, Flask, Tensorflow, PyTorch, Azure

roles.title: Senior Software Engineer
roles.description: Lead Developer For The Message Handler Application the backend for T24 Defence SCC platform project which parses tracking data from different devices and sends it to different platforms/web services. Ported the application to run on Linux using mono and finally using .NET Core 2.0.
roles.technologies: C#, VS 2013 - 17, Rider IDE, NET CORE 2.0, .NET 4.5, WCF, Web Services, EF Core, NUnit, Mono, Docker, Linux, MySQL, MongoDB

roles.title: Junior Software Developer
roles.description: Developed an application with Kongsberg's high geospatial data visualization software which provides situational awareness, command and control to defence personnel in remote locations over satellite communications infrastructure. This application runs on windows and android tablets.
roles.technologies: C#, VS 2013 - 15, .NET 3.5 +, WPF, MVVM, XAML, Entity Framework, NUnit, Git, VistaDB.
